function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on SARS-CoV-2 dynamics in Gulf states and Saudi Arabia","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of disease spread and containment in the region","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive research and data collection on SARS-CoV-2 dynamics in the Gulf states","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance, data analysis tools","People":"Population of the Gulf states, Saudi Arabia","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited studies on Non-Pharmaceutical Intervention (NPI) effectiveness in Gulf states","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of NPIs in controlling disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct studies to assess the effectiveness of NPIs in the Gulf states","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling and simulation tools","People":"Population of the Gulf states, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Exclusion of Gulf states in some global NPI effectiveness studies","Impact":"Inadequate representation of NPI effectiveness in global analyses","Mitigation":"Advocate for the inclusion of Gulf states in global NPI effectiveness studies","Technologies":"Data visualization, advocacy platforms","People":"Population of the Gulf states, global health organizations","Owner":"Public health advocates, government agencies"}]}
